name: XPense
description: Smart expense manager for personal and group expenses tracking with AI-based categorization, file uploads, analytics and integrated UPI payments.

name: EduKitBox
description: Offline-first educational kit order collection for field teams; tablet-optimized PWA with local storage, customer management, and CSV export.

name: Blog App
description: Full-stack blog with RBAC, comments, reactions, social login/SSO and payments.

name: MazeSolver (Desktop)
description: Java 17 + Swing desktop app for solving MathMaze puzzles; native installers via Gradle/jpackage.

name: price_lookup (Chrome Extension)
description: Extension that tracks and notifies lowest product prices.
